title: Divergent Rays
blurb: Divergent Rays is a lovely human being that has a kitschy site full of her esoteric interests. Be sure to check out her Ea-nāṣir Shrine.

title: The Gameboy Abyss
blurb: Lemmy is the kind of nerd I love, obsessed about something ridiculous. This site is dedicated to reviewing every single Gameboy Advance game ever made, abandon hope all ye who enter.
